name: Kowloon City Plaza
description: Kowloon City Plaza is a shopping centre located at Kowloon City, Kowloon, Hong Kong. It was established in 1993, and it underwent a HK$100-million renovation from October 2005 to December 2006. The shopping centre re-opened on 26 January 2007.

name: New Kowloon Plaza
address: 38 Tai Kok Tsui Road, Tai Kok Tsui
description: New Kowloon Plaza (English: New Kowloon Plaza ) is one of the medium-sized shopping malls in Yau Tsim Mong District , Hong Kong . It is located at No. 38 Tai Kok Tsui Road . The shopping mall is 2 floors high and 82,500 square feet. It was completed in 1989. Before Olympian City was built, it was the largest shopping mall in Tai Kok Tsui . The developer of New Kowloon Plaza is Sun Hung Kai Properties . Although the square is not close to the Olympic Station and Mong Kok Station , it is one of the earliest new commercial buildings. Although the name of New Kowloon Plaza contains the words (New Kowloon), its location does not fall within the scope of New Kowloon.

name: Festival Walk
description: Festival Walk is a shopping centre in Kowloon Tong, Hong Kong developed jointly by Swire Properties and CITIC Pacific between 1993 and 1998. At the time of its opening in November 1998, it was the biggest shopping mall in Hong Kong. Festival Walk is acquired by Mapletree North Asia Commercial Trust (MNACT). There are also four floors of offices on top of the mall.

name: Dragon Centre
address: 37K Yen Chow Street, Sham Shui Po District
description: Dragon Centre is a nine-storey shopping centre in the Sham Shui Po area of Kowloon, Hong Kong. It was the largest in West Kowloon until the Elements opened above the Kowloon MTR station.

name: Telford Plaza
address: 33 Wai Yip Street, Kowloon Bay, Kwun Tong District
description: Telford Plaza is a shopping mall in Kowloon Bay , Hong Kong , located below the MTR Headquarters Building , Hang Seng Center and Telford Gardens . Telford Plaza Properties is managed by the MTR Corporation . It was called Telford Mall from 1980 to '97, and Telford Plaza after 1997. It was divided into one phase and two phases. The first phase of the mall opened in 1980 and the second phase in 1997.
